devdoc.details: A coin flip game where two players bet equal amounts of ether. The winner is determined pseudo-randomly, and the winnings, minus a fee, are awarded to the winner.

checkGameTimeout(uint256).details: Check if a game has timed out and refund the first player's bet if it has.

params.gameId: The ID of the game to check.
The ID of the game to join.
The ID of the game to reset.

setTimeLimit(uint256).details: Set the time limit for joining a game.

startGame(uint256).details: Start a new game with a specified bet amount.

params._betAmount: The amount of ether to bet.

devdoc.title: BaseFlip
